Question: A studio session on February 1 marked another ending: it was the final occasion on which Black was to perform with this person.
Hints: In 1957, Robert Mitchum asked this person to costar with him in Thunder Road, on which Mitchum was writer and producer.
While that was a dramatic number, most of what this person recorded for his movie soundtracks was in a much lighter vein.
Since his death, there have been numerous alleged sightings of this person.
